content: Meet Our Doctor | Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland

children.content: D.C.,CCSP, ACCII   Dr. Dean Clark is a doctor of chiropractic and creator of several pain relief products. Throughout his 30+ years of practice he has worked with Olympic athletes, weekend warriors, and everyone in between!
Board Certified in Sports Injuries and Infrared Imaging
Published researcher of pain relief products
Published author of manuals and applications regarding low level lasers
Former Track and Cross Country coach at Stanford University and Oregon State University

Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland specializes in the latest complementary and alternative therapies, allowing us to achieve remarkable clinical improvements in a vast number of conditions that have failed to improve with conventional medical therapies alone including:
Nerve or neuropathic pain including CPRS

Our clinic embraces new approaches to medicine including homeopathy, herbal remedies, pain patches, and an anti-inflammatory diet. These techniques, in the hands of trained physicians, have helped many patients regain their health and wellness without the need for drugs or surgery.

Too often we hear from our patients that they have been told by other well meaning doctors that ”there is nothing more that we can do.” “You’ll just have to learn to live with it.” We know this can be a frustrating experience for everyone involved, the family, patients, and friends, but with the proven techniques and the advancements in the approach to pain medicine, we have the best opportunity for regaining your health.

Here at Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland we value your overall well-being. Our goal is to give you exceptional care at an affordable price. We strive to care about each patient’s wellness like that of our own. We will do our best to work with you regardless of your budget. This is why we have several different options regarding payment for services rendered. Please call (503) 244-3389 if you have any questions about whether your insurance plan covers chiropractic visits or for a complete list of our payment options. We are happy to answer your questions!

Insurance   Here at Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland we accept most insurance plans as well as auto accidents, worker’s compensation, and personal injury cases resulting in back pain, headaches or other related conditions. Feel free to call our office at (503) 244-3389 for any additional questions about your health insurance coverage.

Family Plans   Here at Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland we are dedicated to you and your family’s health. We are happy to customize a plan that suits your family’s financial and health needs. It is always easier to adapt a health mind-set together than alone. We want to be a part of your wellness lifestyle every step of the way. Contact our office today at (503) 244-3389 to start this journey together.

Health on a Budget/Wellness Plans   Here at Comprehensive Pain Clinic of Portland, we want you to know we care. Our goal is to help you feel better regardless of what your situation entails. Prevention is always the best choice; however, we know most people realize this after the injury or pain persists. Regular chiropractic visits are much less time-consuming in the long run than invasive surgeries or other pain management options after an injury. We encourage you to take your health seriously, and call us today at (503) 244-3389 to start your journey. We want to help you regardless of your budget. Health is your greatest gift, and we want to help you maintain it for years to come.
